TopicTitle: KSP scenario items in the wrong place

Articles.Content:
Hello Everybody, maybe someone can help me.

After have tried to install the Parallax/Kopernicus Mod, my KSP is running with some items on its scenario in the wrong place.  For instance, when it is running in the screen where we usually see the Space Center, its appears correctly but other scenarios items like trees, the green surface, mountains and others appears above that like it is entirely shifted up.

Then, when I start a new launch, vessels appears on the middle of nowhere in the green surface like if the Launchpad structure doesn't exist.

Thanks in advance for any help or comment.
